alert.note: Alert for Haskell; Latimer; Le Flore; McIntosh; Muskogee; Sequoyah (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong gusty winds will impact portions of Haskell, northeastern McIntosh, western Sequoyah, eastern Latimer, northern Le Flore and southeastern Muskogee Counties through 1245 AM CDT... At 1214 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong gusty winds associated decaying thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles east of Rentiesville to 2 miles west of Lake Wister State Park. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Poteau... Stigler... Checotah... Warner... Vian... Panama... Gore... Porum... Webbers Falls... Keota... Red Oak... Mccurtain... Bokoshe... Fanshawe... Whitefield... Kinta... Braggs... Tamaha... Rentiesville... Greenleaf State Park... This includes Interstate 40 in Oklahoma between mile markers 258 and 298. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for southeastern and east central Oklahoma.

area.areaDesc: Haskell; Latimer; Le Flore; McIntosh; Muskogee; Sequoyah
